name: Building Components in Figma - a Self-Guided Tutorial
description:
Understanding components in Figma can be a conceptual challenge for designers, both new and experienced.


That's why I created this simple, self-guided tutorial. By the end, you'll be able to:

  • Create complex component sets with multiple properties.
  • Give your designs new levels of flexibility with nested components.
  • Organize a design system with folder structure.


For any feedback, questions, or to hear about more resources & tutorials, feel free to connect with me on Linkedin or Twitter.
